TITLE: Emiliano Brégains
SUBTITLE: Fullstack Developer
PHARAGRAPH-HERO-3: Creating unique experiences and products for each client.

EXPERIENCE.title: Fullstack Web Development
EXPERIENCE.description: Building and designing websites. Starting with the design and analysis of appropriate technologies for each case. Carrying out the development with continuous testing. Deploying them in the cloud, purchasing and assigning domains. Ensuring their performance and monitoring their subsequent performance to provide the best possible product.

EXPERIENCE.title: HMI and SCADA Interface Design
EXPERIENCE.description: Responsible for designing and implementing interfaces for industrial touch panels used by plant operators. These panels control industrial production processes in large factories through Programmable Logic Controllers.

EXPERIENCE.title: Au Pair – Exchange in US
EXPERIENCE.description: In charge of coordinating and accompanying American children while living in. Developed soft skills such as healthy leadership, adaptability to different environments, empathy, and teaching skills, and achieved a native-level command of English.

PROJECTS.title: Odriozola Manager
PROJECTS.subtitle: Query and storage system
PROJECTS.description: Interactive database where an electric motor repair shop stores and utilizes information about their work and clients.

image.alt: Sample of Odriozola Project, showing a table with engine data. Filters on top allow sorting and filtering the items.

image.alt: Sample of Odriozola Landing Page, showing three open engines with their wiring inside, next to three cable coils.

PROJECTS.title: Get Things Done

ABOUT_ME_PARAGRAPH_1: Passionate and self-taught software enthusiast, lover of learning and problem-solving. With a comprehensive and authentic approach, I aim to tackle challenges effectively and collaborate in multidisciplinary teams.
ABOUT_ME_PARAGRAPH_2: I am currently learning German and Norwegian, seeking personal growth and openness to new cultures and experiences.
ABOUT_ME_PARAGRAPH_3: My cheerful and resourceful nature, combined with a creative mind, drives me to find innovative and efficient solutions.
